name: Linda Berardini
text: Love the pizza! One of my favorites. Place could use some updates. Worse thing there is the wings. They have to be the smallest ones I have ever seen! Wish they had free refills on drinks.

name: Bobby Smith
text: The one we visit is in the Kmart in Pleasant Hills, PA. I like the pizza is good. I don't like the fact that they answer the phone at  6:36 PM with " Little Caesar's  Pizza, were closed" is upsetting.

name: Harry Devine
text: Don't bother. This location is never open. It either closes too early or it closes earlier than scheduled with no warning. Either Kmart or Little Caesars or both don't care at all about keepig business at this location. Frustrating when you are hoping to quickly pick up a pizza.

name: Melissa T
text: Why is no one doing anything about this time issue! I walked in at 6:40pm and was told they were closed as the guy from little Caesarswas walking out. I asked what time they closed he said 7pm. But was walking out at 6:40pm. Your time on here shows open until 8pm. This is not right.!!

name: Katelyn Clarke
text: DO NOT GO HERE! I go to little Caesar's pizza all the time but I'll never go to this location. I called and put my order in for a cheese pizza with light sauce and Italian cheesy bread and my boyfriend went to pick it up, mind you i was on …More

name: Brian Freeman
text: Terrible,i was only customer in storeand asked for 3 lg pizzas and girl looked at me like i was making her life hell and said at least 25 minutes,  will never go there again(pl hills)

name: Ken Rebholz
text: I've been there 3 times inn the past 2 weeks to find that they closed early. They are supposed to be open till 8pm. It is 6:11pm. The past 2 times invent there were also around 6pm. Someone needs to either change the store hours or hire employees that will stay open. Very upsetting

name: 12parrots
text: My daughter and I went to this Little Caesar’s in Kmart, when we got home my daughter noticed a dead fly in her fountain drink and when she pulled out a slice of pizza there was a hair ( a black course piece of hair ) that was stuck in the …More

name: Heidi Metts
text: They was dirty and the hot and ready pizza was atleast 3hrs old

name: Illy Junus
text: Love how is delicious and the prize is so affordable

name: Greg Belding
text: Stoped in for a pizza and service was fast and great service.

name: Janet Croyle
text: Only rated one star because i want to clear a few things up here since kmart does not want to update the times of operation  during our winter hours we are open 11am to 8pm monday- saturday and on sundays we are open 11am to 7pm during …More

name: Edward Kirn
text: I went to the pleasant hills location located in Kmart. I bought the pizza at the register with a few other items and the cashier told me to give the little caesars employees the receipt. I walked over to the counter to find a guy cleaning …More

name: Chris Ursiny
text: good pizza if you like 5 dollar pizza

name: Edward Kayton
text: Called 3 times between 11am and 11:40 and rang whole time nobody answered when showed up they were open as i suspected and had to wait for my food which is why i called ahead of time to try ordering ahead instead wait 20 minutes and register down cause outdated system.

name: Alysse Rico
text: Sorry we're closed at 7pm. On a Tues evening. Lol with so many complaints about them closing early on these reviews, why hasn't anything been done to resolve it.

name: Sara Michaels
text: Rude

name: Marcyzag20 Zag
text: Love their pizza !!

name: Gordon Sullivan
text: Always did like Little Caesars can't beat the price

name: A Sommer
text: I have been there twice and this location has been closed both times.  I will NOT go there again.

name: Joe Thompson
text: Just fine

name: Teri Dalton
text: We attempted to purchase pizza here at 8:30 and despite the fact the website says 9 they insisted they close at 8.
